article_title: Report: America's poor fall through cracks of healthcare reform
article_text:
Free Health Payer Daily Newsletter More than 38,000 health plan executives read FierceHealthPayer to stay current on trends in healthcare payment reform, cost containment strategies, the ICD-9/ICD-10 transition, fraud prevention, and more. Sign up for FREE today!

Click here to see a sample.

article_metadata.description: The Affordable Care Act has done little to help the country's working poor, especially in states that have no expanded Medicaid, according to a report from USA Today.

og.description: The Affordable Care Act has done little to help the country's working poor, especially in states that have no expanded Medicaid, according to a report from USA Today.
